body:
Hi all,

Are there any tutorials for guidance on simulating Honeybee's HVAC systems components (for beginners)?



Thanks,

Saurabh

replies.body:
Hi Saurabh, Chien Si has recorded a couple of videos last year:



<iframe _origwidth="560" frameborder="0" height="267" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/59dYNzKzk7Y?list=PLEN8tvi60spMx7iTZ1N30iRJ8YnobdGsE&wmode=opaque" width="475"></iframe>




There have been changes over time but it should be good enough to get you started.
